item.title: 100% DUEL ARENA [ DELTA] works 100%
item.dc:creator: @i_317_i_u_i i 317 i u i
item.description:
@i_317_i_u_i wrote:

Duel Arena 100%

Credits 100% to me.

Tested On; Delta
Difficulty; 4/10
Classes Modified Client.java

NOTE: THIS IS A REQUEST FROM A COUPLE OF PEOPLE SO I DID NOT
MAKE ANY EXPLANATIONS OR NOTES I JUST DID: I SPENT ALOT OF TIME PUTTING
THE OPTIONS AND THINGS TOGETHER SO PLEASE APPRECIATE IT!

Stage 1: Imports and Functional Void’s

Go into your client.java and under public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

add //Dueling public String duelOpponent = "null"; public boolean IncomingRequest = false; public client IncomingReqClient; public client blankClient; public String IncomingReqName = "null"; public boolean inDuelOptions = false; public client inDuelOpponent; public boolean Accepted = false; public boolean armourEnabled = true; public boolean meleeEnabled = true; public boolean rangedEnabled = true; public boolean magicEnabled = true; public boolean specEnabled = true; public boolean forfeitEnabled = true; public boolean drinksEnabled = true; public boolean foodEnabled = true; public boolean prayerEnabled = true; public boolean movementEnabled = true; public void DuelingInterface(client opponent) { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Dueling with: " + opponent.playerName, 6575); showInterface(6575); flushOutStream(); for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) { duelEquipment(playerEquipment[i], playerEquipmentN[i], i); } } public void SendDuelRequest(client cDuel) { IncomingReqClient = cDuel; IncomingReqName = cDuel.playerName; IncomingRequest = true; sM(cDuel.playerName + " wishes to duel with you!"); cDuel.sM("Duel request sent!"); } public void DeclineDuel(client opponent) { clearQuestInterface(); flushOutStream(); IncomingReqClient = blankClient; IncomingReqName = "null"; IncomingRequest = false; closeInterface(); opponent.closeInterface(); sM("You declined the duel."); opponent.sM("The opposition declined the duel."); }

now find public boolean inFunPk() {

and above it add public boolean inDuel() { if(absX >= 3332 && absX <= 3358 && absY >= 3243 && absY <= 3259) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Now find private boolean Attack() { and underneath it add

if(inDuel() && AttackingOn2.playerName != inDuelOpponent.playerName){ sM("This is not your dueling partner"); ResetAttack(); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); return false; }

Stage 2: Clickable Options

Go in ClickingMost.java and underneath switch(c.actionButtonId) {
add //Dueling Options case 26018: //Accept Duel c.Accepted = true; if(c.Accepted == true && c.inDuelOpponent.Accepted == true){ c.closeInterface(); c.inDuelOpponent.closeInterface(); c.toX = 3357-misc.random(22); c.toY = 3244+misc.random(13); c.inDuelOpponent.toX = 3357-misc.random(22); c.inDuelOpponent.toY = 3244+misc.random(13); } break; case 26042: //No Ranged if(c.rangedEnabled == false){ c.rangedEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.rangedEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Ranged", 6698); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Ranged", 6698); }else{ c.rangedEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.rangedEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Ranged", 6698); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Ranged", 6698); } break; case 26043: //No Melee if(c.meleeEnabled == false){ c.meleeEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.meleeEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Melee", 6699); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Melee", 6699); }else{ c.meleeEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.meleeEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Melee", 6699); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Melee", 6699); } break; case 26041: //No Magic if(c.magicEnabled == false){ c.magicEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.magicEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Magic", 6697); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Magic", 6697); }else{ c.magicEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.magicEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Magic", 6697); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Magic", 6697); } break; case 30137: //No Spec if(c.specEnabled == false){ c.specEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.specEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Sp.Atk", 7817); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Sp.Atk", 7817); }else{ c.specEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.specEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Sp.Atk", 7817); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Sp.Atk", 7817); } break; case 26040: //No Forfeit if(c.forfeitEnabled == false){ c.forfeitEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.forfeitEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Forfeit", 6700); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Forfeit", 6700); }else{ c.forfeitEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.forfeitEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Forfeit", 6700); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Forfeit", 6700); } break; case 26045: //No Drinks if(c.drinksEnabled == false){ c.drinksEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.drinksEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Drinks", 6701); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Drinks", 6701); }else{ c.drinksEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.drinksEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Drinks", 6701); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Drinks", 6701); } break; case 26046: //No Food if(c.foodEnabled == false){ c.foodEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.foodEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Food", 6702); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Food", 6702); }else{ c.foodEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.foodEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Food", 6702); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Food", 6702); } break; case 26047: //No Prayer if(c.prayerEnabled == false){ c.prayerEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.prayerEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Prayer", 6703); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Prayer", 6703); }else{ c.prayerEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.prayerEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Prayer", 6703); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Prayer", 6703); } break; case 26048: //No Movement if(c.movementEnabled == false){ c.movementEnabled = true; c.inDuelOpponent.movementEnabled = true; c.sendQuest("@gre@No Movement", 6704); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@gre@No Movement", 6704); }else{ c.movementEnabled = false; c.inDuelOpponent.movementEnabled = false; c.sendQuest("@red@No Movement", 6704); c.inDuelOpponent.sendQuest("@red@No Movement", 6704); } break; //Dueling Options End

Stage 3: Making Dueling Attackable

Go in Client.java and find public boolean isInWilderness

and you should see something like public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absY <= 9474 && absY >= 9405 && absX >= 2687 && absX <= 2755 || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 2980 && absX <= 2993 && absY >= 2629 && absY <= 2645 || absX >= 3371 && absX <= 3381 && absY >= 3225 && absY <= 3239) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } return false; }

Under if (Type == 1) {
and after if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) ||
add inDuel() ||

Now find you need to move deeper into the wilderness.
And above it tou should see if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk() && !inRogueArea() && !inCWars()){
Add under that add if(!inDuel()){
And you should see break; Underneath it add }

Now find "you need to move deeper into the wilderness." again
And above it you should see if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk() && !inRogueArea() && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
Add underneath that if(!inDuel()){
And again under the break; add }

Stage 4: Making the options work

No Armour: Find public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
And underneath it add if(inDuel() && armourEnabled == false){ sM("Armour is turned off in this duel!"); return false; }

Go in potions.java and underneath switch (item) {
Above it you should see if (c.playerHasItem(item)) { Above that add if(c.inDuel() && c.foodEnabled == false || c.inDuel() && c.drinksEnabled == false){ c.sM("You are not allowed to eat or drink in this duel!"); break; }

Stage 5: Death

In Client.java find if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
And underneath it you should see youdied();
Replace it with if(!inDuel()){ youdied(); }

Now find if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
And under it you may see things like removeAllItems();
Change bits like removeAllItems(); and youdied();
to if(!inDuel()){ removeAllItems(); }

Stage 6: Commands

Find a command and above or underneath it add if(command.startsWith("duel")){ String name = command.substring(5); int id = server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(name); if(id != -1){ client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[id]; client me = (client)PlayerHandler.players[playerId]; p.SendDuelRequest(me); }else{ sM("Player is'nt online or does'nt exist!"); } } if(command.startsWith("acceptduel")){ if(IncomingRequest == true){ client p = (client) PlayerHandler.players[playerId]; inDuelOpponent = IncomingReqClient; IncomingReqClient.inDuelOpponent = p; IncomingReqName = "null"; IncomingReqClient = blankClient; Accepted = false; DuelingInterface(inDuelOpponent); inDuelOpponent.DuelingInterface(inDuelOpponent.inDuelOpponent); }else{ sM("Noone has offered to duel with you."); } }

Stage 7: Stopping teleportation

Find public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) {
And underneath it add if(inDuel()){ sM("You cannot teleport out of dueling!"); return; }

Save & Compile!

go in-game and type ::duel name and tell the other person to
type ::acceptduel

I did’nt do every option but I will do I just did’nt have the time.

Credz - 100% made by me
SUGGEST WHAT OTHER TUTORIALS AND WHAT I SHOULD ADD TO THIS
Tell me what things I have missed out on this.

Read full topic
